cleaned_text: top of page Meet Yvonne Rodriguez Certified Massage Practitioner Tailored with your needs in mind , using a combination of modalities to effectively achieve more balance within. Self care through therapeutic massage and bodywork is the fundamental step to restore balance and harmony in your body and a powerful tool to help you take charge of your health and well being . I look forward to working together with you ! Yvonne~ Why Naturopathy Testimonials The best massage I have ever received. Yvonne uses just the right pressure and consistently gives a great massage. I always leave her office relaxed and relieved from any body pain I was having. She is wonderful! — Lynnette bottom of page
